title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.71 - Inspection of records by persons interested
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.71 - Inspection of records by persons interested

State Regulations

All accounting records, registers of participation, valuation schedules, periodic statements, audits under the plan and liquidating
account records pertaining to the mutual trust investment company shall be
subject to inspection, during banking business hours on the three business days
commencing with the 11th business day next succeeding any valuation date, by
any record holder of stock or by any corporate or individual co-fiduciary for
which the record holder is nominee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.71

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
